section.title: Acknowledgments
section.para: Eric Friedman and Itay Maman designed the initial submission. Eric was the primary implementer and is the library maintainer.
Andrei Alexandrescu's work in [Ale01A] and [Ale02] inspired the library's design.

Douglas Gregor, Dave Abrahams, Anthony Williams, Fernando Cacciola, Joel de Guzman, Brad King, Giovanni Bajo, Eugene Gladyshev, and others provided helpful feedback and suggestions to refine the semantics, interface, and implementation of the library.
